title: M-Branes and Their Interactions in Static Matrix Model
abstract: Different BPS M-brane configurations including single and two parallel M$p$-branes ($p$= even) and M5-branes are introduced as the classical solutions of the recently proposed Static Matrix Model. Also the long range interactions of two relatively rotated M$p$-branes (one and two angles) and M$p$-brane--anti-M$p$-brane are calculated. The results are in agreement with 11 dimensional supergravity results.
